name: HSP_ACCT_PXA_PRVRO
description: This table extracts the related multiple response ICD PX - ALT - Other Provider Role (I HAR 3131) item.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the hospital account record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The unique identifier for the price estimate record.

columns.name: IPXA_OTH_PROV_RL_C_NAME
columns.description: The unique identifier for the price estimate record.
